mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CHARGE_INFO ( REQUEST_ID, CLIENT_TRANSACTIONID, AMOUNT, MSISDN, MERCHANT_ID, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION ) VALUES ( #{param.requestId}, #{param.clientTransactionId}, #{param.purchaseAmount.amount}, #{param.msisdn}, #{param.merchantId}, #{param.productDescription} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CHARGE_INFO SET BAN_UNPAID_YN_CODE = #{param.ncasRes.BAN_UNPAID_YN_CODE}, TRANSACTION_TYPE = #{param.TRANSACTION_TYPE}, YOUNG_FEE_YN = #{param.ncasRes.YOUNG_FEE_YN}, BILL_FLAG = #{param.Res_114.BILL_FLAG}, CUST_GRD_CD = #{param.Res_111.CUST_GRD_CD}, PAY_DT = #{param.PAY_DT}, RESULT = #{param.bokuRes.result.reasonCode}, CTN = #{param.ncasRes.CTN}, SUB_NO = #{param.ncasRes.SUB_NO}, FEE_TYPE = #{param.ncasRes.FEE_TYPE}, UNIT_MDL = #{param.ncasRes.UNIT_MDL}, ACE_NO = #{param.ncasRes.ACENO}, BAN = #{param.ncasRes.BAN}, BR_ID = #{param.Res_114.BR_ID}, ISSUER_PAYMENTID = #{param.bokuRes.issuerPaymentId}, RESULT_MSG = #{param.bokuRes.result.message} WHERE TO_CHAR (REG_DT, 'yyyymm') IN (#{param.current_month}, #{param.last_month}) AND REQUEST_ID = #{param.requestId}
mapper.select: SELECT REQUEST_ID, ISSUER_PAYMENTID, RESULT_MSG, RESULT FROM TB_CHARGE_INFO WHERE TO_CHAR (REG_DT, 'yyyymm') IN (#{current_month}, #{last_month}) AND REQUEST_ID = #{requestId}
